title: Golang Variable Manipulation
description: This challenge aims to test your understanding of variables in Golang. In Golang, variables are explicitly declared and used by the compiler to check the type-correctness of function calls.

meta.title: Mastering Golang Variable Manipulation
meta.description: Explore the fundamentals of variable declaration and initialization in Golang, a powerful programming language.
meta.keywords: go playground, go, golang, coding, variables, go labs, go playground online, tutorial, programming, go lab

verify.name: Verify Go Variables Initial Output
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: Go 语言变量操作
i18n.description: 此挑战旨在测试你对 Go 语言中变量的理解。在 Go 语言中，变量需显式声明并由编译器用于检查函数调用的类型正确性。

meta.title: 掌握 Go 语言变量操作
meta.description: 探索强大的编程语言 Go 中变量声明和初始化的基础知识。
